tags-parsed: Criminal Law/Special exceptions/Diminished responsibility/Abnormality of mind/Whether accused suffering from abnormality of mind at time of offence/Whether abnormality impairing accused's cognitive functions or self-control/Section 300 Exception 7 Penal Code (Cap 224, 1985 Rev Ed)
